description:
They've got good news: You can stop pulling that really old threadbare tee out of your closet that you can't part ways with, because they've got a brand-new-yet-worn-in one for you.

In fact, you get to enjoy that well-loved, pre-broken-in feeling from wear number one with this slim fit tee for men. Made from bestselling Cardiff fabric—with naturally bacteria resistant hemp—this style makes everyday outfitting easy.
name: Prana Cardiff LS Pocket T-Shirt - Slim - Mens
